document_data.name: ''Wand of Aid''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Wands of aid''''' were [[enchanted]] [[wand]]s that held multiple charges of healing magics unleashed upon command.
document_data.Description: An average ''wands of aid'' was {{SI|1'3|'"|long=yes}} long. They were usually made using bone, [[ivory]], or [[wood]]. The total number of charges varied from wand to wand.
document_data.Powers: Each of these mages' accessories held several charges of the ''[[aid]]'' [[spell]]. The magics held within the wand could be discharged at will using a command word. Upon expenditure of its charge, a ''wands of aid'' disintegrated.
document_data.Notable Owners: *[[Nym (Icewind Dale)|Nym]], a [[drow]] proprietor of rare and magical goods who traveled [[Icewind Dale]] and [[Dorn's Deep]] in the late 13{{th}} and early 14{{th}} centuries [[DR]].
